mapper.insert: insert into product_changed (id, device_id, material_id, change_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_time = NOW()
mapper.select: select id, device_id, material_id, change_time from product_changed
